mapper.sql: id, billCode, productName, productDesc, productUnit, productCount, totalPrice, isPayment, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, providerId

mapper.update:
update ssm_bill
billCode = #{billcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productDesc = #{productdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productUnit = #{productunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productCount = #{productcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isPayment = #{ispayment,jdbcType=INTEGER},

modifyBy = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
providerId = #{providerid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ssm_bill set billCode = #{billcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productDesc = #{productdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productUnit = #{productunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productCount = #{productcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, isPayment = #{ispayment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, providerId = #{providerid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.*,p.id p_id,p.proname from ssm_bill b inner join ssm_provider p on b.providerId=p.id
